Informational: Party fighting game. 2-50+ Players (local and online, 2-8 players recommended). â€œAny numberâ€ of controllers supported. Same screen.

The Crowded Party Game Collection: Party game with mini games for up to 10 players. Phones as controllers. Same screen.
Table Football Pro: Table football simulation supporting up to 22 local players. The gameplay is like the classic "LEGO soccer table". Same screen

Obliteracers: Micromachines style racing game up to 16 local players, same screen

Sunken: Real time naval multiplayer battles for up to 12 local players, Shared screen.
Coming soon: Party game for 3 to 10 local players using phones as controllers. Same screen.
Regular Human Basketball: 2 teams cooperate to control their teamâ€™s gigantic robot basketball player with rocket jets a magnetic arm and wheels. At least 10 local players confirmed. Online play supported. Same screen.

BeamNG.drive: A dynamic soft-body physics vehicle simulator." 16 local players shared screen. Limited by performance and scenarios available. Create scenarios or use freeroam.(4 XInput, 16 DirectInput, 1 keyboard)

Trenchfoot: Bomberman type game for up to 16 local players. (At the time of writing it doesnâ€™t support single player.) Single screen.
RetroWar: 8-bit Party Battle: Retro arcade games designed for 4 players but support up to 16 local players. Shared Screen.

Dog Fight Super Ultra Deluxe: 2d side view dogfighting game with up to 16 local players. Singleplayer and Online supported as well. Shared screen.
Block Pooper 9: Players control heads competing to collect falling points and collaborating to keep the heart from being eaten. At least 16 local players. Tested with more than 4 XInput controllers. Shared screen
Board Quizz Adventure: a quiz-board game for 2 teams, up to unlimited (!?) numbers of players, only 2 controllers or 1 keyboard needed. Same screen!
JoustMania: Physical party game for open spaces. Requires PlayStation Move controllers. Several game modes. Supports 7 PS Move controllers on Windows or 18+ PS Move controllers on Raspberry Pi. (No screen.)
Cymatically Muffed: Top-down shooter for 16 local players. 16 players on gamepads and 1 player on keyboard. Split screen.
Emoji Charades: Charades type game where you give clues by typing emojis on a phone. â€œUnlimitedâ€ number of players. 1 phone as a controller, the rest participate by guessing the secret word/phrase. Shared screen.
Constructionary: Similar to pictionary. 1 VR player is given a word and tries to create a model representing that word. An audience of any number can watch the screen and guess the word. 1 VR headset + 1 screen.
Acron: Attack of the Squirrels!: 1 VR player plays as a tree whose mission is to protect the golden acorns from theiving squirrels. The squirrels are played by 2-8 mobile device players. Seperate screens.
PartyLine VR: Minigames where 1 VR player plays with/against up to 8 players using phones/tablets as controllers. VR + shared screen.

reaktron: Snake/tron game with a bunch of new features for up to 12 local or remote players using keyboards, gamepads or phones as controllers. Shared screen.
Reiko's Fragments: A VR player tries to escape a haunted house by searching for spiritual items while being chased by a ghost reacting to sounds and up to 8 phone players trigger scares in the house.
Operation Armstrong: Infiltration team game. 1 VR player navigates a level supported by a team of hackers which clear obstacles and disrupt enemies. "Any number" of hackers use phones as controllers. Separate screens.
Lights, Camera, Reaction!: VR + local multiplayer mini game based party game. 2-6 players in VR + keyboard/controller mode. 4-9 players in VR + smartphone mode. Separate screens.
Bomb Fight: Bomberman inspired game with 4 game modes. 12 local players. Support for: 12 gamepads. Shared controllers. 4 keyboard players. Shared screen.
Corona Find Us: Nanobots fight viruses and bacteria. 1 to 16 local players or more. Shared screen.

Star Escape: Planet-hopper space-racer for up to 10 local players. Shared screen.
Republic of Jungle: Social deduction game for 5-10 players. Phones (browsers) as controllers. Separate screens.
Space Debris: Asteroids type game. Co-op or versus.12 ships with different abilities. 1-16 local players. 4 Xinput + 8 Dinput + 4 Keyboard. Shared screen.
